'''Elder Bleda''' was an [[The Eremites|Eremite]] and a member of the [[Tanit]] tribe. 

==Profile==
[[Jeht]] was friends with Bleda, and would pester him to go feed the crocodiles together.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Wisdom Has Built Her House, She Has Hewn Out Her Seven Pillars}}</ref> He was kind to both Jeht and [[Babel]], but for unknown reasons Babel considered him a threat to her objectives. She ordered Jeht to kill him, which she did by stabbing him with a poisoned dagger.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|For Her Judgment Reaches to the Skies...}}</ref> Bleda's name appears struck out on the [[Crumpled Namelist]] in Jeht's tent in the [[Tanit Camps]].
